sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2005, ch. 337, § 1; Laws 2006, ch. 78, § 3.

Repeals.— Laws 2006, ch. 78, § 3 repealed 7-2G-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2005, ch. 337, § 1, relating to the New Mexico filmmaker tax credit, effective July 1, 2006. For provisions of former section,seethe 2005 NMSA 1978 on theNMOneSource.com.
